'ALL: WFIU will carry I.U. football games with broadcasts starting at the following
times. All regular Saturday programs to 4:30 P.M. will be cancelled. Sept. 26
at Ohio State, 12:45 P.M.; Oct. 10, Marquette, 1:15 P.M.; Oct. 17, at Michi¬
gan State, 12:45 P.M.; Oct. 24, at Iowa, 1:15 P.M.; and Oct. 31, Missouri
1:15 P.M.
•uring the summer months WFIU observes Central Daylight Saving Time.
